question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: AssertIsAuthorizedProposer()] [Authorization Bypass] Can an attacker satisfy ValidateParliamentMemberAuthority by becoming a temporary miner, creating proposals, then leaving the miner set? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: AssertIsAuthorizedProposer()] [State Inconsistency] If an organization is retrieved as null at line 24, why does it return 'No registered organization' instead of letting CreateProposal fail at proposal creation? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsReleaseThresholdReached()] [Math Error] Can the multiplication rejectionMemberCount * AbstractVoteTotal at line 68 overflow for large parliament sizes, causing incorrect rejection calculations? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsReleaseThresholdReached()] [Logic Error] Does the short-circuit evaluation (checking rejection then abstention before approval) allow edge cases where a proposal meets approval but is blocked by abstention? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsReleaseThresholdReached()] [State Manipulation] Can the parliamentMembers list be manipulated between rejection, abstention, and approval checks to cause inconsistent threshold calculations? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsProposalRejected()] [Math Error] Can the calculation at line 68-69 produce incorrect results due to integer division truncation when thresholds don't divide evenly? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsProposalRejected()] [Logic Error] Does Count(parliamentMembers.Contains) correctly handle duplicate addresses in proposal.Rejections, or can duplicate votes inflate the rejection count? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsProposalRejected()] [Vote Manipulation] Can attackers add addresses to proposal.Rejections that are not current parliament members, and are these votes silently ignored or counted? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsProposalAbstained()] [Math Error] Can abstentionMemberCount * AbstractVoteTotal overflow for extremely large parliament sizes? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsProposalAbstained()] [Logic Error] If MaximalAbstentionThreshold is 0, can any abstention vote cause proposal rejection, effectively disabling abstention? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals()] [Math Error] Can the approval threshold calculation at line 84-86 suffer from precision loss due to integer division? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: CheckEnoughVoteAndApprovals()] [Logic Error] Does the function return false immediately if approval is not enough (line 87-88), skipping the vote threshold check that might reveal important state? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsVoteThresholdReached()] [Math Error] Can the Concat operations at line 98 create a very large collection that causes memory/gas issues? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsVoteThresholdReached()] [Logic Error] Does Count(parliamentMembers.Contains) at line 99 correctly deduplicate addresses that appear in multiple vote lists (approved, rejected, abstained)? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: IsVoteThresholdReached()] [Vote Manipulation] Can an attacker vote on all three lists (approve, reject, abstain) and have their vote counted three times toward the vote threshold? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: GetAndCheckActualParliamentMemberAddress()] [Authorization Bypass] Can the early return at line 116 allow direct parliament member calls to bypass the managed pubkey check, while admin addresses must go through validation? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: GetAndCheckActualParliamentMemberAddress()] [Logic Error] Does the check at line 132-133 properly prevent admins with multiple managed pubkeys from voting, or can they vote by controlling a different managed address each time? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: GetAndCheckActualParliamentMemberAddress()] [State Inconsistency] Can an admin's managed pubkey change between getting it from the Election contract (line 129) and checking parliament membership (line 136)? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: GetAndCheckActualParliamentMemberAddress()] [DOS Attack] Can an attacker without Election contract cause AssertionException at line 124, making all voting operations fail? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: GetAndCheckActualParliamentMemberAddress()] [Election Contract Dependency] If GetManagedPubkeys returns an empty list, does the function fail at line 130, or can it return a default address? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: Validate(Organization)] [Math Error] Can the threshold validation at line 146-154 overflow when checking sum conditions like MaximalAbstentionThreshold + MinimalApprovalThreshold? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: Validate(Organization)] [Logic Error] Does the validation at line 151-154 correctly ensure that rejection+approval and abstention+approval don't both exceed AbstractVoteTotal simultaneously? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: Validate(Organization)] [Validation Bypass] Can an organization be created with MinimalApprovalThreshold=1 and MinimalVoteThreshold=1, allowing any single member to pass proposals? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: Validate(Organization)] [Edge Case] If MinimalApprovalThreshold equals MinimalVoteThreshold equals AbstractVoteTotal (10000), does this require 100% approval with no rejections/abstentions? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Parliament/Parliament.cs] [Function: Validate(ProposalInfo)] [Logic Error] Can proposals with null ToAddress pass validation at line 159 if the check only verifies non-null without checking for zero address? (Medium)
